name: Rowe
description:
Venture as Rowe through the cave of light in search of a glowing stone of power.

Early Access - Full Release Unknown.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys

Jump: Space Bar

Credits:

Artist: Zanae Hall (ArtofZanae, http://artofzanae.com/)

Composer: Zazzlyn Hall (Pizazzlyn, www.youtube.com/@pizazzlyn)

Game Designer: Solomon Hall (HTOW, hestheonlyway.com)

Story: Zanae Hall
